text: The Good Wife is an American television legal drama set in Chicago, Illinois. It first aired on September 22, 2009 on CBS in the United States. ==References== == Other websites == * Category:2009 American television series debuts Category:2000s American television series Category:2010s American television series Category:American crime drama television series Category:Legal television series Category:Television series set in Chicago Category:CBS network shows Category:English-language television programs Category:American political drama television series
title: The Good Wife
